EmailTemplate.subject: More A320 Parts Now Available From Honeywell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>MORE A320 PARTS NOW AVAILABLE FROM HONEYWELL <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Trading has acquired yet another A320 Series aircraft for teardown. The disassembly process of this A320-214, serial number 1413 with a 2001 date of manufacture has commenced at E-Cube in Cardiff, Wales. Estimated completion is this month.
Removed components will be fully re-certified and available for sale or exchange. A number of items will be available in as-removed condition.
HAT is a growing provider of used serviceable material to aircraft operators and MROs world-wide via our global sales forces and stocking locations in Europe, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
We appreciate your continued business support!
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_A320_201904.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_hat&utm_content=marketo]]>
Your friends at Honeywell Aerospace Trading
